short_summary: Replacement parts for pac'k -harness ass'y Parachute
description: Pac'k and Harness Ass'y Parachute requiments
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**Contracting Entities**
- Department of National Defence (DND)
- Department Address: 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7

### Tender Information

- **Notice ID**: W8485-247839/A (CB-9224-18317076)
- **Notice Date**: September 19, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 03, 2023 (14:00:00)
- **Evaluation Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Procurement Details

- The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to acquire 15 items for the CT114 Tutor aircraft.
- A solicitation for this procurement is only open to qualified holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741- Series - Aviation Replacement Parts.
- The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:
  - Simex
  - Unisource
  - Tower Aerospace Inc.
  - JHT Defense Inc.
  - Aero Precision Industries LLC
  - Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
  - Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
  - Canada West Avionics
  - Honeywell Ltd
  - M1 Composites Technology

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority**: Ryan Duncan
- Contact Email: Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca
- Contact Phone: (613) 292-9650

### Requirement Description
The procurement is for aviation replacement parts, specifically for the CT114 Tutor aircraft. The purchase is subject to the conditions outlined in the solicitation.

### Access to Solicitation Documents

- The solicitation documents will be sent directly to the qualified Supply Arrangement holders who have been invited to submit a proposal.
- Bidders are hereby advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the solicitation documents.

### Additional Information
- The procurement will follow the framework outlined in the Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) between Canada and other countries.
- The aircraft manufacturer will provide ongoing support to qualified suppliers in accordance with the Supply Arrangement.

Please note that this opportunity is subject to any changes in government policies or regulations. The Department of National Defence (DND) reserves the right to make changes to the procurement process at its discretion.

By accessing this notice, you are not entering into any obligation with the Government of Canada or any of its departments.

This is a draft version
